meanings.definition: In a bold and courageous manner
meanings.sent1: She walked gutsily into the dark forest, determined to find her lost dog.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter rushed gutsily into the burning building to save the trapped family.
meanings.sent3: The little mouse squeaked gutsily at the big cat, trying to scare it away.
meanings.sent4: The young knight charged gutsily at the dragon, ready to face the fiery beast.
meanings.sent5: With a heart full of courage, she sang gutsily in front of the large audience.

meanings.sent1: The gutsily squirrel stood its ground against the approaching fox.
meanings.sent2: Her gutsily decision to climb the mountain alone impressed her friends.
meanings.sent3: The little boy's gutsily attempt to lift the heavy rock made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The gutsily flower bloomed in the harsh winter, defying the cold.
meanings.sent5: The gutsily captain led his team to victory against all odds.
